characters.Name: Template
characters.Description: A weak and featureless character, originally used as a base for all others.

characters.Name: Deep
characters.Description: A yellow swordsman. A beginner-friendly character, his melee attacks are quick & powerful, but he lacks range & mobility.

characters.Name: John
characters.Description: A defensive magician. He conjures magical spells to heal and keep enemies at bay, but has extremely poor damage against large groups of enemies.

characters.Name: Henry
characters.Description: A musical archer. Besides shooting arrows, he can play the flute to manipulate gravity. He is quick & simple to use against large groups, but vulnerable in close combat.

characters.Name: Rudolf
characters.Description: A navy-blue ninja. He throws ninja stars and uses gimmicks like invisibility, duplication or transformation. Like the archer, he is incredibly fast, but vulnerable in melee combat.

characters.Name: Louis
characters.Description: An armored grappler. A slow and awkward character, notable for his ability to burst out of his armor and thus transform into LouisEX when he is near death.

characters.Name: Firen
characters.Description: A fire mage. He can easily keep a group of enemies at bay with his fire spells, but he is heavily reliant on mana and difficult to use skillfully for combos.

characters.Name: Freeze
characters.Description: An ice mage. A single touch of his claws or ice sword will freeze foes and energy balls alike. An excellent character for both beginners & advanced players.

characters.Name: Dennis
characters.Description: A lean fighter. He can pressure his foes with homing energy balls or a flurry of powerful kicks. Reliant on combos to deal heavy damage.

characters.Name: Woody
characters.Description: A veteran who excels in duels and dances around the battlefield. The reward for mastering his slow combo startup is unmatched versatility & style

characters.Name: Davis
characters.Description: The main protagonist. He excels at boxing and shooting rapidfire energy blasts. Few can withstand the might of his dragon punch, but he tends to over-commit to his attacks.

characters.Name: Bat
characters.Description: Appearing in stage 5–2, this boss will harass players by constantly unleashing a swarm of homing bats and firing lasers from his eyes.

characters.Name: LouisEX
characters.Description: First appearing in stage 3–5, this spear-wielding boss is renowned for his amazing physical stats and ability to fire a shockwave from his palm multiple times in a row

characters.Name: Firzen
characters.Description: First appearing in stage 4–5, this master of fire & ice will cover the arena in an elemental shower. He is notorious for being able to kill a player in a single explosion or volley of meteors.

characters.Name: Julian
characters.Description: The final boss appearing in stage 5-5, this evil spirit is a masked giant who resists damage and overwhelms his opponents with multiple homing skulls and massive energy projectiles.

characters.Name: Bandit
characters.Description: The weakest but most common enemy. He has no special abilities.

characters.Name: Hunter
characters.Description: An equally common and cowardly enemy who can stun the player with either a strike or a shot from his bow.

characters.Name: Mark
characters.Description: A bodybuilder whose melee attacks do a massive amount of damage. He can ram the player with a powerful shoulder charge.

characters.Name: Jack
characters.Description: A versatile fighter who uses both his Energy Blast and Flash Kick, allowing him to fight in both close and long range.

characters.Name: Sorcerer
characters.Description: A hooded magician who can shoot fire or ice balls, as well as heal himself or other enemies.

characters.Name: Monk
characters.Description: A Shaolin monk who can push his enemies back with a shockwave palm. He only appears in Stage 5 once and Survival as an enemy, but is otherwise commonly seen as an ally.

characters.Name: Jan
characters.Description: The only female character, she is a support magician who can conjure devils to strike each enemy from above or summon angels to heal all her allies at once.

characters.Name: Knight
characters.Description: A giant armored warrior. His thick armor & reflective shield force players to nullify his defenses with a dash attack before hurting him, lest they get cut down by a blow of his sword.

characters.Name: Justin
characters.Description: A masked minion who resembles Julian. He uses a fast but short-range energy blast and a special melee punch.
